metadata.greeting: Hey George! Get ready for a weekend of awesome adventures! We've got trains, diggers, and even dinosaur fun planned just for you, so let's get muddy!

activities.title: Hackney City Farm Visit
activities.description: Meet pigs, goats, donkeys, and chickens at this lovely city farm. Enjoy a coffee at the cafe and maybe even try some pottery!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: George will love seeing all the farm animals and getting up close to the pigs!

transport.tip: Check out the pottery studio for a hands-on experience.

activities.title: DLR Adventure to Mudchute Farm
activities.description: Take a thrilling DLR ride (sit at the front!) to Mudchute, the biggest urban farm in Europe. Meet llamas and lots of other animals.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: The DLR ride and seeing the llamas will be a huge hit!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Stratford, then Jubilee line to Canary Wharf, then DLR to Mudchute
transport.tip: Sit at the front of the DLR for the best views!

activities.title: Young V&A Playtime
activities.description: Explore the under 5s play area at the Young V&A, with design workshops and interactive exhibits.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: George can get hands-on and explore design in a fun environment.

transport.tip: Check the schedule for design workshops.

activities.title: Olympic Park Playground Adventure
activities.description: Enjoy the massive playgrounds at the Olympic Park, including Tumbling Bay (sand & water) and the Pleasure Garden splash area.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: George will love the sand and water play at Tumbling Bay!

transport.tip: Bring a change of clothes for water play!

activities.title: Discover Children's Story Centre
activities.description: Immerse yourself in interactive storytelling, dressing up, and character visits. A perfect place to spark imagination.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: The interactive elements and character visits will keep George engaged.

transport.tip: Check the schedule for character visit times.

activities.title: Victoria Park Fun
activities.description: Enjoy two great playgrounds, a boating lake, and a deer enclosure in this beautiful park.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: George will love seeing the deer and playing on the playgrounds.

transport.tip: Bring bread to feed the ducks on the boating lake.

activities.title: Natural History Museum Dinosaur Adventure
activities.description: See the T-Rex skeleton and other amazing dinosaurs in the Dinosaur gallery. Explore the Wildlife Garden too!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: The T-Rex will blow George's mind!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Liverpool Street, then Circle/District line to South Kensington
transport.tip: Go early to avoid crowds in the Dinosaur gallery.

activities.title: London Transport Museum Exploration
activities.description: Climb on old buses & trains, try the tube simulator, and play in the All Aboard play zone.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: George will love climbing on the buses and trains!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Liverpool Street, then Central line to Holborn or Piccadilly line to Covent Garden
transport.tip: Look for the stamper trail for extra fun.

activities.title: National Maritime Museum AHOY!
activities.description: Explore ships gallery and AHOY! children's gallery (under 7s). There's a great playground outside too.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: George will enjoy the ships and the hands-on exhibits.

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Canada Water, then Jubilee line to North Greenwich
transport.tip: Take the Thames Clipper boat from Tower Pier for a scenic journey!

activities.title: RAF Museum Aircraft Adventure
activities.description: See huge aircraft hangers, a 4D cinema, and an outdoor playground. Free parking!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: George will be amazed by the planes and helicopters!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Gospel Oak, then Northern line to Colindale
transport.tip: Check out the 4D cinema for a thrilling experience.

activities.title: Crystal Palace Park Dinosaurs & Playground
activities.description: See the Victorian DINOSAUR STATUES on islands! Plus a farm, maze, and great playground.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: George will be thrilled to see the dinosaur statues!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Highbury & Islington, then Overground to Crystal Palace
transport.tip: Bring a picnic to enjoy by the dinosaur statues.

activities.title: Thames Clipper Boat Trip to Greenwich
activities.description: Take a REAL boat ride along the Thames to Greenwich. Sit outside at the back for the best views!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: George will love the excitement of a boat ride!

transport.fromHackney: Bus 254 to Aldgate East, then walk to Tower Pier
transport.tip: Pack snacks and drinks for the journey.

bookAhead.title: Book Ahead
bookAhead.subtitle: Coming up in the next 2-8 weeks

activities.title: Hey Duggee Live
activities.description: See Hey Duggee and earn badges in this fun live show!

activities.title: Peppa Pig Live
activities.description: Sing and dance with Peppa Pig and her friends in this lively show.

activities.title: Dinosaur World Live
activities.description: See LIFE-SIZE dinosaur puppets in this amazing show!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: George will be amazed by the dinosaur puppets!

activities.title: The Gruffalo
activities.description: See the classic story brought to life on stage!

activities.title: Bluey's Big Play
activities.description: Join Bluey and Bingo for a playful adventure on stage.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: He will love seeing Bluey on stage!

activities.title: Dear Zoo Live
activities.description: See the classic story brought to life on stage!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: He will love seeing the animals!
